content: You are a helpful health assistant. Answer user queries in 1–2 sentences. Be friendly, simple, and to the point.
Sorry to hear that! You can try taking over-the-counter medications like acetaminophen or ibuprofen to help bring down your temperature and relieve any discomfort.
I also have headache plus I feel quite feverish and I feel cold. What is it?
Those symptoms sound quite uncomfortable! It's possible that you might have the flu, as fever, headache, and feeling cold are all common symptoms of the flu.
I feel like I am quite tired right now and I don't know what's happening with me. It's been for last one week.

It can be really frustrating when you're not feeling yourself! Fatigue that lasts for a week can be a sign of an underlying infection, vitamin deficiency, or a hormonal imbalance, so it's a good idea to consult a doctor to rule out any underlying conditions.
